data.name: RangeSelectionArguments
desc: contains the arguments for starting the range selection.

properties.name: CloseOnMouseRelease
desc: specifies if the range selection is finished when the mouse button is released, after selecting cells.

properties.name: InitialValue
desc: contains the initial value for the range descriptor.

properties.name: SingleCellMode
desc: specifies if the range selection is limited to a single cell only.
If TRUE, the selection is restricted to a single cell. If FALSE, multiple adjoining cells can be selected. The default value is FALSE.

properties.name: Title
desc: contains a title for the operation.
